description: Kling AI is Kuaishou's text-to-video and image-to-video AI that generates up to 3-minute cinematic videos with impressive physical realism. Kling AI is a video generation platform by Chinese tech company Kuaishou that has impressed the AI community with its ability to generate long, coherent videos up to 3 minutes with realistic physical simulations. It supports both text-to-video and image-to-video generation, lip sync, and virtual try-on. Often cited as competitive with or better than Sora for certain use cases. Highlights: Up to 3-minute video generation. Excellent physical realism. Image-to-video conversion. Lip sync support. Competitive pricing.
